title: Matara House for Sale
details:
Matara House with 4 rooms, 2 bath rooms, a pantry, a large sitting area, all facilities including ample parking (over 15 vehicles) located in 52 perches land at Delkada Road (close to Rahula College, Sujatha College, Matara MMV School.) is available for sale. Suitable for business / Office or Residentials purpose.

Contact 0777725349 / 0112792360
